#Recipe Edit.

= Introduction =

Use Recipe Edit to edit, insert or make a recipe.


= Details =

Use the Recipe Edit activity to enter data to update an existing recipe or insert a new one.
*Screen Fields*
||*Screen Field*||*Description*||
||Recipe||Recipe name||
||Serves||How many people this recipe serves, or when making a meal how many serves to make||
||Method||Expandable list of method steps||
||Ingredients||Expandable list of ingredients and quantities used||

*The options menu*
||*Menu Option*||*Description*||
||Make Meal||Make the current recipe||
||Discard||Discard changes made||
